name: ROW COLOR
description: Use this command to change the color of a single row on the screen.
syntax:
ROW_COLOR FROM from_row THRU thru_row COLOR background_color
TEXT_COLOR text_color

parameters.name: from_row
parameters.description: from_row - f/c/e - Required - The starting row number. The first row in a window is number 1. This value will always be related to the current active window.

parameters.name: thru_row
parameters.description: thru_row - f/c/e - Required - The ending row number. If you only want to change the color in a single row then this should be the same value as the FROM value.
